# decodeTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

Numerically earliest sample decode timestamp in the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var decodeTimeStamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

Return the decode timestamp of the first sample in the buffer, since even out-of-presentation-order samples are expected to be in decode order in the buffer.

Returns [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid] if `sampleTimings` is empty or contains invalid [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleTimingInfo/decodeTimeStamp].
title: decodeTimeStamp
